page.title: 15A Schoolboy's Day
page.content: I am a schoolboy aged eleven years. A typical day in my life would be as follows.I get up at 7.00 a.m., get washed, dressed and have my breakfast of cornflakes, toast and tea.I am finished by 8.00 a.m. and watch T.V until 8.35 a.m. then I go for the bus which takes the children who live in the housing scheme to school. We get off the bus where a Lollipop Lady puts us safely across the road. When I get to school I talk to my friends until the bell rings. We go into the classroom and do a selection of work like English and Writing and Mathematics. We have a playtime at 10.40 a.m. and lunch at 12.30 p.m. At lunchtime I play with my friends in the playground. We finish school at 3.30p.m. I watch T.V. at night after I do my homework. I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
